sections.description: FAQ plugin that gives you a chance to make, sort out and expose your FAQs (frequently asked questions) in a matter of seconds through your WordPress administrator board. Select from FAQ designs and styles.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  • Upload the 'mos-faq' folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory or install via the WP admin panel
  • Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
  • That's it.
